    public class Editor
extends android.widget.MultiAutoCompleteTextView
    Editor class to handle code highlighting etc Derived from: https://github.com/markusfisch/ShaderEditor/blob/master/app/src/main/java/de/markusfisch/android/shadereditor/widget/ShaderEditor.java
